data_descriptor.name: interval
data_descriptor.description: The descriptive statistics of time (mean/S.D./min/max) that passes between successive interactions with social apps between wake and sleep.

algorithm.description: The sample is a list that contains four elements as follows: 0 - the average interval between successive interactions, 1 - the standard deviation of the interval between successive interactions, 2 - the minimum interval between successive interactions, 3 - the maximum interval between successive interactions.
